publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1257 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees as a revision to the programme of business for Thursday 6 May 2004- Â Thursday 6 May 2004 delete, 3.00 pm Executive Debate on Scotland's Beaches - A National Resource insert, 3.00 pm Ministerial Statement followed by Executive Debate on Scotland's Beaches - A National Resource Supported by: Tavish Scott*
